companyName: The Law Office of Jackson Pitts - Asheville, NC
description:
Attorney Jackson M. Pitts founded his Asheville law firm, The Law Office Of Jackson Pitts, with the goal of protecting the rights of victims of negligence living in Asheville and surrounding Western North Carolina. By representing injured victims and their families during negotiations or at trial, Mr. Pitts helps bring financial security to the lives of those affected by the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice

In addition to the above practice areas, Mr. Pitts assists individuals by representing their interests in bad faith insurance cases. He also assists business owners and company leaders by providing counsel for a variety of commercial litigation-related matters, including breach of contract, fraud and commercial torts.

Whether your legal need is personal or professional, you can turn to the experienced attorney at The Law Office Of Jackson Pitts for assistance. Mr. Pitts has helped countless clients from throughout Western North Carolina overcome complex legal challenges, and he can help you overcome yours as well. If you would like to learn more about the range of services the law firm offers or why the residents of the region regularly turn to Mr. Pitts, you can schedule a free initial consultation at the firm's Asheville law office.
